Posts.Content: had seroma too and had to be drained a couple of times already. swelling has been diminishing and now no longer feels like golf ball but a little marble ! what painkillers are you on ? Just started chemo and they told me not to take paracetemol and ibruprofen as they could lower temp artifically and take me to sick to codeine, which I'm worried if I just take codeine, will I get addicted to them ? Posts.Title: The dreaded seroma
